synopsis.text: After a tragic suicide of her idol, a renowned journalist, 17-year-old Sayako Amanokawa finds herself bestowed with an extraordinary ability to perceive spirits. This unexpected gift follows a near-death experience, awakening the dormant journalist within her and propelling her on a quest for truth. However, as she delves deeper into the spiritual realm, she encounters formidable forces determined to thwart her investigations. Despite the mounting dangers, Sayako remains undeterred, her resolve to uncover the truth only growing stronger in this thrilling supernatural adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
